text:
Recommend their kuabao because itâ€™s so juicy and the meat literally melts in my mouth. Their fried chicken and braised minced meat bento is really good too! I have been here for many times and will definitely keep going back for their food.

The dining area is shared with other restaurants so it can get a bit busy during lunch time but so far we are able to get a table for two people.
Minced pork rice (lu rou fan) was delicious but there was nothing special to warrant a revisit.

Decent and affordable Japanese Taiwanese grub in an atas food court setting at Margaret Market. The dons were well done and flavourful. The chicken soup was herby and chicken well-seasoned. The mentaiko fries were a great complement and our meal (dinner) was satisfying.
It's a small shop not easy to notice but their Taiwanese food is authentic for sure I will go visit many times. Their Peeled Chilli Chicken Soup you must try it.
Excellent pork bun and rice! My regular go-to place if I crave for Taiwanese food! ðŸ˜„
